name: GeometryDodge
description:
Controls
  • W,A,S,D for movement
  • Clicking on a red enemy kills them, but removes 20% of your health (HEALTH DOES NOT REGENERATE).
Important Information

I was unable to fully finish the game (menu, textures etc.) so there are some things you should know.

  • Please tell me if the thing actually runs!
  • When you reach 0 health , the game will pop up an error usually. This just means you died.
  • I know it is not the best, due to me being a beginner and me not finishing it.
  • The rules are simple, do not hit the red blocks.
  • Blocks spawn around the edges on purpose so you have less space to just camp.
